data.text:
Ashton Kutcher Quick InfoHeight6 ft 2Â½ inWeight80 kgDate of BirthFebruary 7, 1978Zodiac SignAquariusSpouseMila Kunis

Ashton Kutcher is an American actor, producer, former fashion model, comedian, TV host, entrepreneur, and venture capitalist who is known for his roles in shows and movies like That â70s Show, Two and a Half Men, The Ranch, My Bossâs Daughter, The Man Who Saved the World, No Strings Attached, Jobs, Annie, What Happens in Vegas, and The Butterfly Effect. Apart from his career as an actor, he has frequently invested in several high technology startups including Neighborly, Zenreach, and ResearchGate.

Born Name

Christopher Ashton Kutcher

Nick Name

Ash, Kutch, Skank Kutcher

Sun Sign

Aquarius

Born Place

Cedar Rapids, Iowa, United States

Residence

Los Angeles, California, United States

Nationality

Education

Ashton Kutcher attended Washington High School, Cedar Rapids. After that, he went to Clear Creek Amana High School (CCA), Oxford, Iowa. Here, he developed a passion for acting and appeared in school plays. Then, he joined the University of Iowa to study Biochemical Engineering (He was motivated by the desire to find a cure for his brotherâs ailment) and later dropped out for modeling.

Occupation

Actor, Producer, Former Fashion Model, Comedian, TV host, Entrepreneur, Venture Capitalist

Family

Father â Larry M. Kutcher (Factory Worker)

Mother â Diane (Finnegan) (Worked in Procter & Gamble)

Siblings â Tausha (Older Sister), Michael (Fraternal Twin Brother)

Manager

Untitled Entertainment

Build

Athletic

Height

6 ft 2Â½ in or 189 cm

Weight

Ex-Spouse

Ashton started dating Demi Moore (American Actress) in May 2003. They married on September 24, 2005. The wedding ceremony was attended by 150 close friends including Bruce Willis (Demi Mooreâs ex-husband) and their 3 children. It was Kutcherâs first and Mooreâs third marriage. On November 17, 2011, Moore released a statement describing about her intention to divorce Kutcher. On December 21, 2012, Ashton filed for divorce, which was finalized on November 27, 2013.

Girlfriend / Spouse

Ashton Kutcher dated â

Nelly Furtado

Monet Mazur (1995-1996) â Ashton started dating actress Monet Mazur in 1995. They dated for almost 1 year before breaking up in 1996.

Gina Zimmerman (1995-1996)

January Jones (1998-2001)

Ashley Ellerin (2000-2001) â He was previously in a relationship with Ashley Ellerin who died on February 21, 2001, after she was stabbed by serial killer Michael Gargiulo 47 times to death in her home in Hollywood. Later, in 2019, Ashton testified at the trial of Michael Gargiulo that he had been at her home the night she was murdered.

Ashley Scott (2001-2002) â He dated actress and model Ashley Scott from 2001 to 2002.

Brittany Murphy (2002-2003)

Amy Smart (2003) â Rumor

Brittney Jones (2010)

Sara Leal (2011)

Rihanna (2012) â Rumor

Mila Kunis (2012-Present) â Ashton and Mila first met on the set of That â70s Show. At that time, Mila was 14 and Ashton was 19. They romanced on-screen in the show at that time in 1998. The duo didnât start dating until April 2012. After two years of dating, the couple got engaged in February 2014. In September 2014, Kunis and Kutcher welcomed their first child, daughter Wyatt Isabelle Kutcher. They also had a son named, Dimitri Portwood Kutcher in November 2016. On July 4, 2015, Ashton and Mila married each other in a secret wedding.

Race / Ethnicity

White

He has Irish, Czech, and German ancestry on his motherâs side while he is of Czech descent on his fatherâs side.

Brand Endorsements

He has endorsed and appeared in TV commercials for numerous brands such as Nikon Cameras, Popchips, Calvin Klein, Gap clothing, Pizza Hut, National Mentoring Month, etc.

Ashton has also appeared in several print ads for Zoo York, Nikonâs D60 SLR camera, charitable funds, etc.

In 2021, he was seen in the Cheetosâ Super Bowl LV commercial with Mila Kunis and Shaggy.

Religion

Judaism

His first TV show That â70s Show (1998-2006) and Two and a Half Men (2011-Present)

First Film

1999 film âComing Soonâ for his role as Louie

First TV Show

âThat â70s Showâ for his role as Michael Kelso, which aired on TV from 1998-2006 and had 8 seasons. He appeared in all the seasons.

Ashton Kutcher Favorite Things

Favorite Food â Italian food, particularly pizza

Favorite Movies â Forrest Gump (1994), The Shawshank Redemption (1994), Scary Movie (2000), Gladiator (2000)

Favorite Books â Where the Red Fern Grows ( Wilson Rawls in 1961), Many Lives, Many Masters (Brian Weiss), Mutant Message Down Under (Marlo Morgan)

Ashton Kutcher Facts

Ashton Kutcher had attempted to steal money from Clear Creek Amana High School (the place where he was studying at that time) with his cousin at midnight and was caught and arrested. He was given a third-degree and was sentenced to 3 years probation and also 180 hours of social service.

While studying at the University of Iowa, he sold his blood in order to pay his college fees.

Now, he owns a restaurant in Los Angeles, USA called Dolce.

Ashton Kutcher has also produced many films and TV shows. His first produced film / TV Show was Punkâd which is a hidden camera-practical joke reality TV series, aired from 2003-present.

On April 16, 2009, Ashton became the first user of Twitter to have more than 10,00,000 followers.

In 2009, Ashton co-founded the anti-child-sex-abuse organization, Thorn, along with his ex-wife, Demi Moore. In September 2023, it was revealed that he was stepping down as chairman of the board of Thorn.

In 2007, Ashton was voted as one of the Sexiest Men Alive in Peopleâs Magazine.

Ashton Kutcherâs two toes of his right foot are webbed.

He portrayed the character of Steve Jobs, the business magnate, industrial designer, investor, and media proprietor, in his biographical drama film, Jobs, in 2013.

While preparing for his role as Steve Jobs in the 2013 movie, Jobs, Ashton was hospitalized twice due to pancreatitis.

In January 2022, Ashton and Mila sold their 7,351 square feet Beverly Hills-based house for $10.35 million. The couple had previously purchased the house in 2014 for $10.215 million.

In March 2022, Ashton and Mila donated $3 million to Ukraine after the Russian attacks.

In the past, Ashton suffered from a rare form of vasculitis, which impacted his vision, hearing, and his equilibrium.
